description: An MCP server designed for AI-powered marketing and social media content creation. This service provides tools, templates, and frameworks to help create engaging content across top social media platforms.

tools.name: find-hooks
tools.title: Find Social Media Hooks
tools.description: Find social media hooks by network and/or category

limit.description: Maximum number of hooks to return

network.description: Social media network (twitter, instagram, linkedin, tiktok, youtube)

category.description: Hook category (engagement, educational, promotional, storytelling, etc.)

tools.name: get-network-categories-for-hooks
tools.title: Get Network Categories
tools.description: Get all available categories for a specific social media network

network.description: Social media network name (twitter, instagram, linkedin, tiktok, youtube)

tools.name: list-copywriting-frameworks
tools.title: List Copywriting Frameworks
tools.description: Get a list of available copywriting frameworks and their descriptions for a specific social media network

network.description: Social media network (twitter, instagram, linkedin, tiktok, youtube, facebook)

tools.name: get-copywriting-framework
tools.title: Get Specific Copywriting Framework
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific copywriting framework for a network

network.description: Social media network (twitter, instagram, linkedin, tiktok, youtube, facebook)

framework.description: Framework name (aida, pas, bab, 4cs, uuuu, pppp, slap, app, storybrand)

tools.name: list-archetypes
tools.title: List Voice Archetypes
tools.description: Get a list of all available voice archetypes with their names and descriptions

tools.name: get-archetype
tools.title: Get Voice Archetype Details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific voice archetype including tweet examples

tools.name: flag-problematic-phrases
tools.title: Flag Problematic Phrases
tools.description: Check text for phrases that should be avoided to make content more human and less AI-like. Returns any flagged phrases found in the text.

text.description: The text to check for problematic phrases

tools.name: validate-content-before-fold
tools.title: Validate Content Before Fold
tools.description: Check if content meets the before-fold character and line limits for each social media platform

contentType.description: Content type (only relevant for YouTube: 'title' or 'description')

tools.name: get-text-before-fold
tools.title: Get Text Before Fold
tools.description: Truncate text to fit within the 'before fold' character limits for each social media platform for previewing purposes

contentType.description: Content type (only relevant for YouTube: 'title' or 'description')

tools.name: get-trending-content
tools.title: Get Trending Social Content
tools.description: Fetch trending social media content from the HyperFeed API

limit.description: Maximum number of trending items to return

networks.description: Social media networks to get trending content from (e.g., 'twitter' and 'reddit')
